50 years in the S&P 500: Bull markets dominate
Historically, bull markets last much longer than bear markets and their returns are much higher than the bear market declines.
Change in S&P 500 during bull and bear markets since 1970
Change in S&P 500 during bull and bear markets
Note: Data through February 19, 2020, the last day of the most recent bull market.
